turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Jane, do you think you can order me a medium caramel frappe from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want a caramel frappe from Starbucks, you say?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct. Maybe we should order a couple pizzas from Beggars as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so a caramel frappe from Starbucks and 2 pizzas from Beggars?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of pizzas? What sizes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good question. Do we have any vegetarians or vegans in the office?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, I do not believe so.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, to be on the safe side, we will get three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, what pizzas do you have in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 1 sausage, 1 pepperoni, and a plain cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, what sizes for those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make them all family sized pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so you want a medium caramel frappe from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right..

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 family sausage, 1 family size pepperoni, and 1 family size cheese pizza, from Beggars, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You are correct!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How would you like this to be paid for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They have my information on file.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! I will place the order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: .... Order is placed, It will be ready in about 25 minutes for pickup. also, your receipt will sent to you via email.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sound good, thank you. I will go get them shortly.
